text: Futhi yisho izindaba ezimnandi kulabo abakholwayo futhi abenza okulungileyo okwabo yizivande okugeleza ngaphansi kwazo imifula, njalo uma bephiwa izithelo ezivela kulezi zivande bothi “lokhu kuyikho esakuphiwa ngaphambilini”, futhi bephiwa okufanayo, futhi okwabo lapho phakathi yizithandwa ezimsulwa, futhi bayohlala nazo kuze kube yingunaphakade
